topic.fullpath: Topic :: Communications :: Email :: Mail Transport Agents

name: PHP Rich Mailer
short_description: phpRichMailer is a set of PHP scripts and forms that allows to send rich text/html emails via sendmail or smtp server with username/password. It features automatic HTML2TXT conversion, automatic charset detection and multiples base64-encoded attachments.
